question.title: Bigtable aggregated values
question.body:
I'm trying to figure out how to use the Aggregate values at write time preview feature in Bigtable. The documentation states that this should be possible to do using the Java API, but there are a couple of things that I find confusing:

  1. The documentation above states that I need to add an aggregate column family to the table. This implies that this is a special type of column family, but I can't find any way to specify a type, in Terraform or in the GUI.
  2. The RowMutation class of the Java API does include an addToCell method that will do the sum aggregation, but I can't find any way to do the min and max aggregations listed in the documentation.
